snippet: Efforts by the South Street Seaport Museum to return one of its tall ships to Hamburg, Germany, where it was originally launched, have fallen through.
abstract: Efforts by the South Street Seaport Museum to return one of its tall ships to Hamburg, Germany, where it was originally launched, have fallen through.
lead_paragraph: Efforts by the South Street Seaport Museum to return one of its tall ships to Hamburg, Germany, where it was originally launched, have fallen through.

headline.main: Wanted: A Berth for a Lonely Old Ship
